page.title: 03 An Arable Farm.
page.content: We interviewed Mr.F.Ivens of Cherry Tree Farm,Fox Hill,Woodford Halse. He has a mixed farm of 148 acres (12 fields).In 1985 40 acres are arable: 7 potatoes,18 wheat and 15 barley.He bags and sells the potatoes himself on the farm.The wheat and barley he uses as winter feed for his cattle and sheep together with approximately 51 acres of hay and silage.He has 1 regular worker and 5 casual workers to help him on the farm.He thinks that this year he will get 90 tons of grain and 85 of patatoes.He uses 4 fields for grain and 8 fields for cattle and grass.He owns: 3 Tractors,1plough,2 sets harrows,grain drill,potato planter,potato harvester, potato sorter,grass mower,hay bob, bailer,flat 8 sledge grab,4 trailers and a fertilizer sprayer.His farm animals are:50 beef cattle,30 sheep,80 chickens,13 geese and 1 working dog.
